https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wyoiAElQTILo291fYpUGiCntQyO.jpg The film consists of person in the street interviews with diverse people in the Los Angeles area during the several days immediately following the September 11, 2001 tragic events in the United States. 9-11: American Reflections
